description: Over the past few days, food delivery workers have carried out strikes in several countries demanding safe working conditions in the face of the coronavirus pandemic and an increase in delivery rates to ensure the workers a livable income. The countries include Brazil, Spain, Argentina, and Ecuador.
author: nataliyaned
addresses: iFood, 1496, Avenida dos Autonomistas, Osasco, Região Imediata de São Paulo, Região Metropolitana de São Paulo, Região Geográfica Intermediária de São Paulo, São Paulo, Região Sudeste, 06020-010, Brasil
Dia, 6, Costanilla de los Ángeles, Barrio de los Austrias, Sol, Centro, Madrid, Área metropolitana de Madrid y Corredor del Henares, Comunidad de Madrid, 28013, España
